main.bio: My name is Pooja, I'm a Front-end Developer. Currently, I am training to learn new technologies and open for job opportunities. I worked for VMware, GE and Accenture in my career.
main.contactmessage: Get in touch with me to receive further details.

testimonials.text: Quality of the deliverable was commendable. The entire scrum team acknowledged the fact that Pooja's delivery was of highest quality. One other notable thing worth mentioning is also the appreciation by our System architect on the timeliness and the quality of the deliverables. Awarded for the same during the month of Feb(2016) for her relentless and focused work. She also helped the new team members and interns in mentoring them and ensured that they deliver better.
